title: Ward disappers
body: When I play mid lane, I back after a few mins to buy items and I usually get 2 control wards. Every time I put the ward in top river bush and then put it on the other side it dissapers. I know someone could have killed it but I watch it and no one is near it. It doesn't happen again but it happens in the beginning. please fix.

replies.body:
Every champion can only have a single control ward on the map at any one time.
If you place another, the first one will automatically die.
